headline: Acadia Healthcare (ACHC) Brings Back Former CEO Debra Osteen Is Management Turnover Reshaping Its Strategy?
summary: Acadia Healthcare Company announced that Christopher H. Hunter has stepped down as Chief Executive Officer and director, with former CEO Debra K. Osteen returning to lead the company and rejoining the Board as a Class I director, effective January 20, 2026. Osteen’s reappointment brings back a veteran behavioral healthcare operator with deep industry relationships and prior leadership experience at Acadia and Universal Health Services. We’ll now examine how Osteen’s return to the helm...
